verbose_text: While treatment with these inhibitors had no significant effect on invasion of BEAS-2B cells transfected with control siRNAs (siControl), single or combinatorial treatment with these inhibitors greatly inhibited the increase of cell invasion induced by the double knockdown of PTEN and SMAD4 (XREF_FIG and XREF_FIG).
evidence: invasion induced by the double knockdown of PTEN
